# Specification Docs

## C# 8 draft specification

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/specification/overview.md): Understand the relationships among the ECMA C# standard and the working draft.

## Feature specifications

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/specification/feature-spec-overview.md): Understand the relationships among the ECMA C# standard and the feature specifications for newer language features implemented in roslyn.
